name: 玄龙棋MysteryChess
description: This game is a new chess game.new plays,new rule,new framework .It's a game about eastern dragon against western dragon.Simulation of nature. A variety of elements.A variety of plays.Pay attention to strategy as well as to rely on luck.It Can bring extraordinary fun.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows xp Processor: core i3 Graphics: 500m Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows7 Processor: core i5 Graphics: 1G Storage: 500 MB available space
